readable.title: 2831313661_1a328acb70
readable.content: A man gathers kite string on the beach . A man in a brown striped shirt is walking on the beach with a roll of string in his hand . A man wearing jean is flying a kite near the shore . A man with a polo shirt and jeans happily flies a kite . The boy with the cap holds the kite string and spool while smiling .
